title: Joint Commission renews Gold Seal for UC Irvine Health heart failure program (UC Irvine Health ...
text: ( Source : UC Irvine Health System ) October 14 , 2015 The UC Irvine Health Heart Failure Program has again earned the Gold Seal of Approval from The Joint Commission , healthcare's predominant standards-setting and accrediting body. This
